UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Fatty acid chain modification enhances the serum stability of antimicrobial peptide B1 and activities against Staphylococcus aureus and Klebsiella pneumoniae
Literature.Author: Liao Z, Wu Y, Liu M, Zhang J, Cui Y, Zhangsun D, Luo S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=128 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:40% Cytotoxicity=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus BNCC 186335(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus BNCC 330041(MIC=>32µM),Bacillus subtilis BNCC 109047 (MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii BNCC 337173(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae CMCC 46117(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa BNCC 125486(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Candida albicans CMCC 98001(MIC=>32µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>32µM),Candida albicans BNCC 186382(MIC=>32µM),Candida parapsilosis BNCC 336515(MIC=>32µM),Candida tropicalis BNCC 340288(MIC=>32µM),Cryptococcus neoformans BNCC 225501(MIC=8µM)
